/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen in motion on the road, indicating a busy day in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban hustle and bustle below.
